sentences.en: A portion of the proboscis that adapted as a sucking organ in many insects.
sentences.cn: 一种小而颜色鲜艳的美洲热带歌鸟,有弧形喙,适于从花中吮吸花蜜.

sentences.en: At least they didn't give me a butterfly's proboscis, or crab mandibles.
sentences.cn: 至少他们没有给我一只蝴蝶的鼻子，或者一只螃蟹的下颌。

sentences.en: Did You see Proboscis Monkey Before?
sentences.cn: 这种动物你见过 吗 ?——长鼻猴(图)

sentences.en: It hovers in front of the flower , using its proboscis to look for nectar.
sentences.cn: 它在兰花前面飞来飞去, 用喙寻找花蜜.

sentences.en: It'sticks its little proboscis in and just stays right there, bathed in bliss.
sentences.cn: 它把小小的长吻伸了进去,就在那里呆着不动, 沐浴在极乐之中.

sentences.en: Its proboscis has got stuck to a lot of pollen.
sentences.cn: 它的喙上粘了很多花粉。

sentences.en: Its proboscis works like a syringe to draw out blood.
sentences.cn: 它的口器工作原理就像注射器抽血.

sentences.en: Old World monkeys: guenon; baboon; colobus monkey; langur; macaque ; mandrill ; mangabey; patas; proboscis monkey.
sentences.cn: 旧域猴：长尾猴; 狒狒; 疣猴; 叶猴; 短尾猴; 山魈;白眉猴; 长鼻猴.

sentences.en: The bug’s serrated proboscis touches the skin’s nerves at fewer points than it would if smooth.
sentences.cn: 因为不光滑的缘故，所以蚊子锯齿状的尖喙会较少触碰到皮肤中的神经。

sentences.en: They prey on other invertebrates, which they capture with a unique proboscis.
sentences.cn: 它们用独特的吻捕食其它无脊椎动物.

words.tran_cn: 鼻子；[昆]喙；象鼻；[无脊椎]吻

trans.tran_en: the long thin nose of some animals such as an  elephant
